title: Graduate Studies Committee
cleaned_text: All BME Ph.D. students must select a supervisor for their dissertation research. Students may work with any member of the BME Graduate Studies Committee (GSC), which is comprised of BME department faculty as well as faculty in related fields who are active participants in the biomedical engineering graduate program at The University of Texas at Austin. The GSC makes curriculum recommendations and is responsible for graduate program policies through the program's [Graduate Advisor](/about-us/faculty-directory/dunn). Responsibilities of the GSC include graduate student instruction, advising, and supervising theses, reports, and dissertations. Prospective GSC members can apply by [completing this form](https://utexas.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_eS9t05h0bSTuP7U).
